settings.title: Our Story
settings.subtitle: Building PCs since 2015
settings.text:
RigFreaks was founded by a group of passionate PC enthusiasts who believed that high-performance computing should be accessible to everyone. What started as a small workshop building custom PCs for friends has grown into a leading provider of custom gaming and workstation computers.

Our mission is to deliver exceptional computing experiences through thoughtfully designed, meticulously crafted, and thoroughly tested systems that exceed our customers' expectations.

settings.title: Quality
settings.text: We use only the highest quality components from trusted brands

settings.title: Expertise
settings.text: Our team of experts has decades of combined experience in PC building

settings.title: Passion
settings.text: We're enthusiasts who love technology and gaming

settings.title: Community
settings.text: We're building a community of PC enthusiasts and gamers
